titles.title: No Early Release for Carjackers Act of 2023
No Early Release for Carjackers Act of 2023
A bill to amend section 3624 of title 18, United States Code, to require carjackers to serve their prison sentences.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
No Early Release for Carjackers Act of 2023
This bill makes an individual ineligible to receive good time credits to reduce a prison sentence that the individual is serving for a federal carjacking offense.
